i18n.title: Contributors
i18n.description: Found a bug or want a new feature? Become a contributor!

state.title: The State of Nullstack
paragraphs: Nullstack is being developed since January 2019 with features being extracted from freelancing and enterprise projects.
At this point the API is stable, lifecycle methods and context keys will pretty much be frozen.

roadmap.title: The Roadmap
paragraphs: The next updates will be guided towards fixing any bugs that are found and focus on quality of life.

The updates listed on <a href="https://github.com/nullstack/nullstack/issues" class="text-pink-600" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Nullstack issues<\/a> are the next planned steps without any particular order.

core.title: The Core Team
paragraphs: Nullstack was developed by full stack neuro-atypical ex-freelancers.
With a heavy background in Rails, Ember.js, React.js and the Vue.js philosophy the inspirations took from those projects might be obvious.

team.name: Christian Mortaro
team.description: Creator of the concept. Comes with new API proposals to its favorite rubber ducks and returns with commits.
team.contribution: Reverse engineered wishful thinking code into existence and then refactored it into a framework.

team.name: Anny Figueira
team.description: Rubber duck with a neck to find inconsistencies and problems, waiting till an API is approved to force us into rewriting everything.
team.contribution: An early adopter of the framework that developed real production applications to validate how the parts fit together.

team.name: Dayson Marx
team.description: Rubber duck with human skills that makes sure the code is not going too far outside the box, then makes the box look nice.
team.contribution: API reviewer that developed third party projects to test proof of concepts from a front-end focused perspective.

team.name: Bianca Augusta
team.description: Aspiring comic writer, Warcraft/FFXIV addict, loves healer and tank roles.
team.contribution: Mother of Nulla-Chan and reads scripts here and there under pure pressure from Mortaro.

team.name: Guilherme Correia
team.role: import Member from <a href='https://github.com/vuejs-br' target='_blank' rel='noopener'>vuejs-br<\/a>
team.description: Experimentalist, writer of fictional universes and dreamer that develop while listening to untitled cassette tapes.
team.contribution: User of undocumented features and creator of issues requiring documentation that he will do himself.

team.name: Bruno Michels
team.description: Weeb at the top of ranks on Stack Overflow, CoderWars, CodersRank. Plays games and develops things for fun.
team.contribution: Something with types. Brainwashing the creator to add TypeScript to Nullstack.

contentCreators.title: The Content Creators
paragraphs: These people help us spread the word about Nullstack, because the core team is socially inept.

team.name: Alisson Suassuna
team.description: Full stack JavaScript developer, passionate about technology. Reader of bibles and documentations.
team.contribution: Creates <a href='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLw608KLEKJz_W3P6hRayh6fz9BL13soI1' class='text-pink-600' target='_blank' rel='noopener'>tutorials about Nullstack explaining step-by-step<\/a>. Focused in making Nullstack easy to use.
team.work: Founder and instructor at  <a href='https://tipscode.com.br/' class='text-pink-600' target='_blank' rel='noopener'>TipsCode<\/a> with over 8 years of experience in computer science

instructions.title: How to Contribute
paragraphs: It's simple. Found a bug or want a new feature?

<a href="https://github.com/nullstack/nullstack/issues" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Create an issue<\/a> or <a href="https://github.com/nullstack/nullstack/pulls" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="ci1">submit a pull request<\/a> with tests.

i18n.githubCacheWarning: * The list might take a while to update due to GitHub API cache

star.story: Want to show your love and help us spread the word?

page.description: Found a bug or want a new feature? Become a contributor!
